section.heading: Repealer; savings clause.
section.text: The Vital Records Act of 1981, effective October 8, 1981 (D.C. Law 4-34; D.C. Official Code ยง 7-201 et seq.)("Act"), is repealed. The existing rules implementing the Act shall remain in effect until superseded by rules promulgated under the Vital Records Modernization Amendment Act of 2018, passed on 3rd reading on July 10, 2018 (Enrolled version of Bill 22-250).
